rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0001
rows.name: Huh? Honey...?

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh, you brought Melosian Honey!
Thanks!

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0003
rows.name:
I've been up to my neck in Militia
Corps work. Just couldn't make the
time to go to Honeypot Grotto myself.

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0004
rows.name:
It's a risky undertaking with the
monsters and whatnot. I couldn't
get anyone else to go either, and...

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0005
rows.name: Oh, right!

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0006
rows.name:
You've proven to be a capable,
not to mention brave, lot!

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0007
rows.name:
Uh, it might be a bit much, jumping
from honey straight into this, but...

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0008
rows.name:
How would you like to join the
Militia Corps?!

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0009
rows.name:
Sorry, I don't mean to put you
on the spot or anything...

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0010
rows.name:
It's just that, you know, with
Trigo's consul gone...

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0011
rows.name:
There's all sorts of small incidents
cropping up all over the place.

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0012
rows.name:
For example...
We've got some Nopon illegally
squatting in our town...

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0018
rows.name:
I hear the townsfolk and Superbian
soldiers at the Trigo base have been
beefing with each other too.

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0013
rows.name:
The kids saw the adults squabbling, so
now they're following suit. That's
another issue that needs handling!

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0019
rows.name:
I also got word that Feyla's having big
problems getting deliveries since the
consul went.

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0014
rows.name:
I hate to just sit idly by while all this
goes on, but the Militia Corps are
short-handed as is.

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0015
rows.name:
Think you could help out?
Every little bit helps.

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0016
rows.name:
You will? Great!
Thanks!

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0017
rows.name:
If you can fix those four things that the
militia told me about, that'd be great.

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0103
rows.name:
We've got a bunch of problems in this
town... For example, we've got some
Nopon illegally squatting here...

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0101
rows.name:
Once you've dealt with them all,
come and give me your report.

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0102
rows.name:
The Militia Corps are counting
on your cooperation!

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0201
rows.name:
My colleagues already
told me the news!

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0202
rows.name:
You did as well as I hoped!
Thanks! It's a big help.

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0203
rows.name:
No one's making excuses for old
Consul Morph, but I have to say,
the town was calmer back then...

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0204
rows.name:
I suppose he must've been working
behind the scenes to make it so.

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0205
rows.name:
That said, I really hope the next consul
is more, shall we say, upstanding.

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0206
rows.name:
Or, well, if Superbia up and left,
the problem would solve itself...

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0207
rows.name:
Ah, no, don't worry.
That's not your problem, really.

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0208
rows.name:
And anyway, consul or no consul,
this is our town.

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0209
rows.name:
We'll work our arses off to make sure
we can take care of it ourselves.

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0210
rows.name:
Here. It's just a small token
of our appreciation.

rows.label: qst1013_02_msg0211
rows.name:
You really helped us out.
Thanks again!
